comment: Excellent. Unique. The only app I found (among plenty of Todo, timers, planners) which allows to choose as much recurrent deadlines as needed and wanted for the same note. Thank you.

title: Best and simple

title: Open source goodness

solid basic functionality just what was looking for, well designed, why HTC/google removed their basic notes app I just don't understand

title: Nice.

title: Got-IT!
comment: Is kind of better looking and more intuitive / convenient to use.

title: Awesome task app
comment: Great app, especially love the minimal/customizable widget that comes with it. A suggestion would be to have an option to limit the amount of tasks shown in the widget so that it could run faster on the homescreen (right now when I scroll through the widget, it flashes with text that says "loading").

title: Reverse order in List
comment: Order when selected manually is the other way around than on my google calendar task list.   Does it have a widget to?

title: Reverse Order of Tasks in Tasks List

title: One the best tasks/to do apps... With some issues
comment: It is more of a tasks app than a notes app, syncing perfectly with Google Tasks so it wld be much better that the icon & name reflect this. 2 irritants:  # It creates a notification for each reminder - shld be one notification which can be scrolled or expanded. # Widget font is just ugly.. Pls give a choice of fonts or have the same one as the app. Pls fix soon.. I would love to rate it 5* Also it shld sync reminders & due time with same app on other device & if we cld see calendar reminders within the app

title: My most used app.
comment: Love the sync feature, can update lists on the computer with the Google Tasks site and push to phone. Great widget implementation, good looking interface, open source, responsive dev, intuitive and efficient design. Best notes app I've used by a good stretch. Use it constantly. Easy 5 stars!

title: Awesome but...
comment: It needs a way to send checked items to the bottom of the list. Other than that, I really like the UI, and everything else about it ☺

title: Fabulous
comment: Not nearly enough space to say all the good things about this app as a list note and reminder app!

title: Great companion to Google tasks
comment: Customizable widget and dates no longer limited to 2 years ahead since some fixes. Last fix appears to have broken displaying Saturday's though. :-(

title: Nice

title: Nice update!

title: Great

title: Best note app

title: Best note taking app

I apologize for the problems. I'm working on an upgrade that should sort it out.
Simple and effective. Best widget for tasking needs for me.

title: My OCD says you need to try this app.
comment: If there's one thing I've learned about my obsessively compulsive side, it's that though it may be weird & often obnoxious, it's never been wrong.
Seems a bit slow. At 5 MB it's twice the size of some similar apps. I like the night mode option.

title: Almost perfect
comment: I'm given 5 starts because it do at it's says nicely and have a beautiful widget as I like... To be perfect needs option to define repeat alarms (instead of doing it one by one) and attach images!

title: Looks great but no sync
comment: Used this app for a few years now. The look has kept improving but I can no longer sync with Google, making this pretty useless as I switch between my phone and tablet a lot. Shame as it was great.

title: More Nonsense Than None
comment: As the up was updated, more and more nonsense crept in, i.e. completely unnesessary, gee-whiz animations. Then, there were huge sync-conflict issues with Google Tasks.

title: Sync to SDcard!
comment: The sync to SDcard feature is great! This kind of thing is just what we need apps to do so we can fully host our own cloud. Thanks Dev; A+++ Would app again!

title: setting widgets
comment: excellent for handling google tasks and keep them in sync. however, an option to set global settings for widgets (transparency, fonts, etc) would be GREAT.
Clean and simple. Dark theme is great for night time use. User friendly. Full featured. Sync is great.
Very good straightforward just what i needed thanks

title: Awesome
comment: Handles all my Google Tasks without a hitch. Love the tablet layout. Considering it's free, 10/10!!

title: Nexus 5
comment: Best note / task app on the market. Clean and simple user interface. Great job.

title: Best widget
comment: Great transparent and framless widget.

title: Go note
comment: Good note

title: Plenty of nonsense
comment: If the title says no nonsense you should probably take out the nonsense

title: Great. Except no dual account sync.
comment: Open source equivalent of GTasks and Tasks Free. Both of which are good. But this is better, simpler, and open source. It also handles multiple accounts, although its UI doesn't make that clear. Just sign into the second one in settings. CORRECTION: I seem to have lost this ability and in fact the whole programme no longer syncs to either account properly. Strange.

title: Best gtask app
comment: Wow. Not all shined up and perfect but this magically had everything I wanted. And I'm a list shopper addict. This is a keeper. So simple and pleasant to use that I often feel like moving my todoist tasks over here... The best of the simple task apps that I've seen.

title: Nononsense note
comment: The free version is great. I was glad to donate.

title: Great Concept, but Flawed Implementation
comment: I appreciate the simplicity in the app's design (though it can be somewhat confusing at first), and how it can synchronize to my Google account, *and* that it extends DashClock.  Unfortunately, as others have noted, the app currently archives extant notes, which is rather annoying. They can be restored easily enough, but it's not particularly convenient.  If this gets updated, then it would be the cleanest note app due to its combination of simplicity and features.

title: almost perfect,
comment: please ad smaller menu fonts, and repeted tasks

title: Beautiful layout. Best note widget, period.
comment: Great app. Very HOLO. I'd love to see Google Keep integration or a chrome app. The widget could also use some more settings like organizing and choosing which notes should be higher or lower on the list. In total, this app is great and is the only widget allowed on my home screen.

title: Dropbox
comment: Would very much like to see Dropbox or Google Drive support.

title: Could be better!
comment: Absolutely love the simple, yet inclusive nature of this app! Worth buying the full version! However, there are some areas that they could improve especially in the realm of reminders.

title: Deleted a bunch of tasks on sync
comment: It was great as long as it worked. But I just lost lots of tasks/entries after it synchronized with google tasks. It is also annoying to have to delete duplicate list names upon re-installation.

title: Amazing!
comment: Perfect for all tasks. From shopping lists to To-Do lists; this application is the one app you need to stay organised. Great for having list on multiple devices. Very easy to use, and the widget is a nice touch.
Incredibly Full-Featured Task Management App with Google Tasks Sync!

title: Love it!
comment: Overall, this app is amazing. One suggestion though.  Somehow check for duplicate task lists when syncing. If app is uninstalled and reinstalled/synced, a duplicate list named 'tasks' is created.

comment: Used this for some time now and despite trying others, I always return to this one. Syncs with Google, clean interface simple and quick. Also love the transparent widget keeping me up-to-date!

title: This Note app is amazing...
comment: Give this redesign a chance.  I was one of those who enjoyed the 'old' version and was thoroughly confused upon the redesign and stopped using it for a few months (and forgetting how the 'old' version worked)  I was in the midst of cutting and pasting all my notes to a new app when I started to enjoy the redesign's navigation, configuration and abilities (drag to sort, separate sort types for each list, check box on or off for each list, etc, etc)  Lots to discover of what to tap+hold, drag, settings for each screen, etc, etc.  -Looks like I'm cutting and pasting BACK to NoNonsense Notes.  One thing; Just wish there was a better way to edit the Notes (tasks in gmail) on the PC side - the pop out window  for gmail-tasks stinks!

title: Amazing
comment: At first i didnt make much of this note and tasking app but as i used it, it has become indispensable in my studies, reminding me accurately of the things i need to do. Highly recommended and great holo interface

Plan to donate to get more themes but think they should have at least two free ones to choose from or able to add your own. But its fast and sharp. Plus its free.  Haven't had a problem yet! Must download if your looking for a note app

IMO, there is a lot of nonsense/bloat here for an app billed as NoNonsense Notes.

title: Best simple note app

title: This is amazing!
comment: This is without doubt the best note taking app I have ever seen on the Google Play store!   It automatically syncs with your Google account so that way you do not have to sign up for another service like Evernote.   In addition to that you can place it on your lockscreen which will enable you to very quickly take a note at the drop of a hat   You should definitely purchase the donate version of this app just because the developer is awesome. To the dev: thank you so much for your awesome work!

title: Basic but good
comment: This is a great app. Easy to use, looks good, syncs with Google.  Some basic text formatting would be good (bold, italic, underline).

comment: Many good features and well worth it. But when revising a note there are some basic text-editing issues so if adding to one sentence will overwrite the one below. Strange! because other than these text editing issues (never seen in any other app), clearly well-designed.

title: Awesome!

Also, I would suggest having to put your password in twice so minimises the possibility of typing it in wrong.

title: Really Neat App.
comment: I've always been fussy when it comes to notetaking apps, and this is arguably one of the best I've come across! Excellently designed & fits in perfectly with Google's own apps, plenty of features which I'm sure will only be improved on.  Can also say I've found the developer to be great at responding, I inquired about a checklist style functionality to which he replied quickly saying he doesn't think it'd be possible for what the app is trying to achieve.   Hope this can find a way into my note-taking but right now I use Drive for full notes and ColorNote checklists for quick lists, whether there can be an in between we'll see!

comment: Great app, good looking widgets, syncs perfectly after update, excellent support from dev, thanks!

title: Perfect
comment: Google should pay you for this and make it standard Android app.

title: Best Notes App
comment: This is, by far, my favourite app for taking notes. Syncs with your Google Tasks and utilizes the holo theme so it looks great. The developer also pushes out fairly consistent updates, so there's never any concern that the app has been forgotten. Amazing for the low price of free.

title: Great app
comment: I reported a bug to the author which was preventing me from syncing notes between my phone and tablet. The author responded quickly and turned around a bug fix in less than a week. Fantastic!

title: The best

title: Gets better and better (and nicer looking)
comment: This app is the nicest Google notes app I have tried. However, there seems to be a few bugs; the Widget shows notes from all lists, even though it's set to show only a specified list (-1+). Widget looks good though, and I like how the devs are utilizing the Holo theme across the app and widget. Update: Widget works fine now - back to 5 stars!

title: Awesome app!

title: It works...sometimes.

title: Love it.

title: Great interface
comment: The app has a really nice interface, widget is useful also. I am having an issue with the latest version, I cannot get the most widget to display my order of the tasks. Thanks.

title: Fix the dark widget
comment: Love this app, its functionality is second to none, however the last update has ruined the dark widget for me. When placed on lighter colored wallpapers, the dark widget doesn't have enough opacity, and it makes the white type used practically illegible. Please fix this. There was no issue with the widget in previous versions, no need to change it, especially when the change in opacity has made it more difficult to read.

title: No Nonsense Indeed
comment: Pleasantly surprised by the simplicity and elegance. One of the best tools for a Google Tasks user. There can be a few more productivity improvements which should flow incrementally I believe. I do not use and did not review the widgets.
Lookout said this app is unsafe

title: Simple, clean, easy and free!
comment: Thanks for this great useful and streamlined app, and it's free :) great job, couldn't bring myself to buy a notes app but then found this one for free when it has just as many features of paid ones and no ads! Get it, what have you got to lose?

title: I like it
comment: So easy .. So useful .. So helpful ;)

title: Love it

title: Great!
comment: Just what I need it.

title: This app is just what I needed!
comment: I switched from iOS to Android, and I missed having my reminders and to do lists synced with my computer, this allows me to use Google's Tasks list (which i prefer to apples list)  Wonder piece of art!  Thank you so much for this being free! When I can, I will donate, but seeing as I just purchased this new android device... it might be some time!  Thanks!

title: No concept of undo
comment: Probably I am not using the app for what it is its  purpose. But I hoped it was good for jotting down some text and then syncing it; pity that everything but writing is complicated and counterintuitive, and especially the lack of un Undo function made me lost some notes, because I selected the wrong option, which was poorly explained at least for me.

title: Perfect - simple

I think making it sync to Doc would be better.

title: Hate this app.

title: App Works well
comment: I have been searching for quite some time for an note/task keeping app that works well and easy to use.  Not only did I find that, but one that actually syncs with Gmail and My Calender.  Excellent Find!!!  The only thing to nit pick is it would be nice to customize the widget size.  Currently (unless I'm not seeing a way to change it) the widget is stuck on 2x2.  It would be nice if I could adjust it.  The only other thing maybe to mention is Gmail is a bit clunky at displaying the tasks, but that's Google's problem.

title: Good solid note taking app
comment: The only note pad on the market that has sync, the ICS theme and is open-source to boot. My only wish is that it would optionally sync to Google drive instead of to Gmail tasks. Once that's implemented it's five stars all the way!

title: Clean but Minimal
comment: While this application is pretty and does a great job of staying true to Android design principles, there's a few features missing before it can replace my go to task app (GTasks):  1) Swipe left/right between lists 2) Sorting as a menu option (rather than on the preference screen) for quick access and 3) sorting by due date puts all completed options at the bottom of the list.

comment: Who's idea was it to make a refresh button that links to the preferences screen?

title: Its just okay
comment: The widget is good but the list and defaults confusing. Default list setting to all notes but when start a new note it asks for an default list. So you can't add a new note unless you set default. For a simple app it shouldn't have that many hoops to jump. The widget is nice but take a few tries to make it right. Just wish it defaults to something that more intuitive instead of tweaking so much to make it work.

title: widgef
comment: simple, transparent and dark widget pls

title: Good app, needs better features
comment: The recently added lock functionality only seems to lock editing.  Would like to be able to lock access to notes.

title: Won't sync
comment: I turned on syncing but it won't sync my notes with Google tasks on Gmail... is it just me?

title: Simple, looks great on both phone and tablet
comment: The new tablet update looks great on my Touchpad and is lightweight and functional on both my phone and tablet.   Scrolling is even fixed! And the most recent updates include my number one wanted features, sync and the ability to change your font size!  This app is great.
Simply amazing...

title: Great
comment: All-around great app. Perfect combination of design, functionality, ease of use and developer communication.

title: Really nice app
comment: Clean and straight forward. And designed to reflect Android design language. Good job

title: Good start
comment: Should improve syncing capabilities and add note taking options. But it is a good start.

title: very nice
comment: clean UI, just works :) add indentation (sub-task) support and custom ordering and it'll be a winner!

title: Easy and fast
comment: Makes keeping me on task simple

title: Looks just like a stock app!
comment: Blends nicely with the operating system, which most apps fail to do.

title: Very handy
comment: Great little note taking/task list app. I really like the simple interface.

title: Galaxy Nexus ICS
comment: Best task app for galaxy nexus and works like peaches and cream with agenda widget plus. Love it and no ads. Thanks for the good work! Recommended for any one with galaxy nexus!

title: This is absolutly Awesome!
comment: Just what a tasks app should be. Blends perfectly with ICS. five stars! Two things i'd like to see though: Smaller font size on the widget and ability to check V near completed tasks on widget. Also timed notifications...  None the less these features are minor. Awesome job!

title: Very promising!
comment: Finally a real Google Tasks app. It syncs with Google Tasks and looks like the real deal. Still needs a bit more features like displaying your tasks/notes in personal order, but it really is a promising app.  Google should buy this.

title: Holo theme and Google task sync!!
comment: I've used this program for less than 5 minutes and it is already the best note application I have installed. Does exactly what I need and nothing more.

title: Amazing
comment: App that does exactly what it is supposed to and more. The only app that adheres to the Holo theme set by Google. Waiting for widget support and hopefully a way to set the time the task should be completed as well has notifications.

title: It's ok.
comment: This needs to add an option for time reminders.  Also I can't find the widget in the widget list.

title: Love it
comment: With the new widget this is exactly what I've been looking for. Thank you for making this.

title: Excellent
comment: Its ics compatible!!! You got my vote

title: Text size
comment: Please allow the changing of text size for the widget. would love to be able to swipe to change task lists. Please also color code the tasks for the different lists.

title: Notes!
comment: My favorite notes app for ICS. A must for google tasks users, and developer has been great adding features like widget, sorting, notifications, etc for an already free app! Keep up the great work!

title: Best!
comment: Clean UI . Great options. Ics optimized . Got my vote!

title: Google
comment: Take note Google, send this man a big fat check for the rights to this app. The best.

title: Brilliant
comment: Thanks so much for adding the "sort by last modified" option. The old "compose" icon was better by the way.

title: Awesome
comment: Glad to see the ICS design implemented.

title: Very good!
comment: Love it!

title: Brilliant!
comment: Fantastic note and todo app! Really nice and clean ICS style. However, I woud like to be able to rearrange tasks, and see  "Today", "Tomorrow" sections for due-date tasks.

title: Awesome task app
comment: So we designed, thank you for following design standards.  Can't wait for widget.  One request, make less padding around a tasks' text so you can view more tasks at once on the screen.

title: requires completed tasks to move to bottom of list
comment: Eye candy app, combines notes with to do. Still in development but will get more features. would be better if completed tasks moved to bottom of list

title: Very good, light weight app
comment: Love it, especially for sticking to the design guide, but I'm still waiting for indentation support on lists?

title: Only thing missing is a widget
comment: Devs, look at this app, this is how it is done. Absolutely stunning look and simplicity. Integrates 150% with ics guidelines..  Now, a widget and it's complete
Best Notes App for Ms

title: Great
comment: Love the look

title: Notes
comment: The real and beautiful ice cream sandwich notepad

title: Good start
comment: Good looking and functional app - wish there was a better distinction between tasks and notes that don't  need to be completed. Galaxy Nexus ICS 4.0.2

title: Great!
comment: Easily the best note-taking app out there! Only things missing are AAW support and/or a native widget.

title: Great start
comment: Shaping up to be the best task app on the market. Looking forward to the widget.

title: Great support
comment: Near instant reply when submitting a bug, and fixed in the next version. Noice!

title: Awesome!
comment: Please honour system rotation setting!

title: Excellent, more please!
comment: Excellent app, could use a widget though.

title: Even better after update
comment: A few glitches with dates, but update has fixed those. Great UI - looks like a native app.
Looks and works beautifully

title: Battery hog
comment: Used 40% of my battery doing something according to android battery stats. Uninstalling.

title: Great Dev
comment: Reported a bug and it was fixed within hours. Just bought the donate version to support this constantly improving app

title: great!
comment: i love this app! like someone below me said, it fits in perfectly with the ics stock apps! i would definitely buy the donate version, but i am not old enough to own a credit card hence no linking of one to my account :/ sorry.

title: Awesome!!
comment: Follows ics guidelines and looks like a native app!!

title: Nice app.
comment: Would suggest clearing complete tasks automatically. Can't wait for the widget.

title: Close to perfect
comment: Cant wait for widget support

title: Nicely done
comment: I dig this apk. please hook us up with  scrollable widgets!

title: Love it
comment: Nice ICS interface

title: Truly beautiful
comment: By far the best notes app I've found for Android so far.

title: Great Job
comment: Google couldn't do it better them selves.

title: Seamless.
comment: Should really be bundled in with the Google Apps. Now has residence on my home screen. Well done. :)

title: Works and is Gorgeous!
comment: There are many note taking apps but due to it being tablet optimised and following the ICS Guidelines makes this the best I've used.

title: Very nicely done
comment: Pretty much the best notes app for ICS yet. Done so well following Android UI guidelines that it almost feels it came from Google. Well done!

title: Great work
comment: Love the UI & Gmail sync !

title: Love the UI
comment: Designers take note, this is how it should be done :)

title: Wonderful
comment: It's a rarity among developers to actually follow the style guide of platforms. Feels just like using what a native notes app would be. Good job!
Excellent

title: Looking Good
comment: I am a sucker for holo themed apps and this one keeps getting better. All it needs now is the ability to hide completed tasks and a widget.

title: Nice and simple
comment: Does the job and does it well. Would be nice to hide file list when held landscape on a tablet ( with a swipe? )

title: Excellent
comment: No bullshit, just an app for taking notes. The market needs more apps like this.

title: Excellent
comment: Simple yet effective while remaining nice to look at. Well done.
5 star all the way!

title: Simple, yet effective.
comment: This app is great. It's lightweight, quick, conforms to the ICS theme. Would be nice if you could implement some sort of stylus input and alarm-based notfications, but this is your app and not mine. 4 stars for an awesome app and + 1 star for Reddit

title: Thanks for proper tablet support
comment: Great!

title: Works great.
comment: Simple but effective.

title: Pretty good
comment: Nice app and UI matches with Google's guidelines. Share button doesn't work.  Device: Galaxy Nexus

title: Works well
comment: Fairly simple app which works well for its intended purpose. Would be even better if it could sort notes by created timestamp.

title: Awesome
comment: Clean, simple, and the only notepad I need. Made by a redditor too.

title: Works great
comment: Works like any other note taking app. A checklist/slash feature would be a nice addition.

title: Simple -
comment: Does exactly what it describes and looks great with ICS.

title: Great and simple
comment: Love the UI that finally matches ICS. Simple with no frills and keeps the look very simple and elegant. Gets the job done
